downloadDescription: This download consists of flyers, videos, and poster which provide an introduction into understanding security issues associated with social networks, such as privacy, and being aware of the type of information people share personally and professionally.

detailsSection:
These resources – brochures, flyers, videos, and posters -- provide an insight into social networks, and what employees need to consider when using them. Also included is a quiz for testing a person’s internet security understanding, a booklet on online fraud, list of helpful website and resources, and several educational videos that are ideal for team and company meetings. 

Several of the flyers and posters are provided as PowerPoint so they can be customized with company logo and contacts. The flyers can be turned into a single documents, and used as an employee training manual. 

Complementing these security resources is a “Protect your Devices & Documents Security Kit,” “Be Safe Online Security Kit,” and “Security Best Practices.”

installInstructionSection:
• To start the download, click the Download button, and then do one of the following:
    • To start the download immediately, click Open.
    • To copy the download to your computer for viewing at a later time, click Save.
    • To cancel the download, click Cancel.
